title: Source Contract Manufacturers in United States for OTC Products
snippet:
We need someone to source contract manufacturers in the United States that can manufacture Lice Treatment Shampoo with the following specifications:


Active Ingredient(s):

• Piperonyl butoxide (4%)

• Pyrethrum extract (equivalent to 0.33% pyrethrins)


Inactive Ingredients:

• ammonium laureth sulfate, dehydrated alcohol, fragrance, isopropyl alcohol, PEG-25 hydrogenated castor oil, polyquaternium-10, purified water

Link tosimilar product in the market:

https://dailymed.nlm.nih.gov/dailymed/drugInfo.cfm?setid=3a45af7f-b0f3-53f5-e054-00144ff8d46c
